column5: Congradulations G and family,
Very nice. Congratulations.
Congratulations my friend
Wow G!  Fantastic news!  Congrats to all of you on your new fishing partner!
Congratulations Gerritt!
Congrats Gerritt!
right on - congrats, on all counts
Happy to hear that things have turned around for you Gerritt. Congrats.
Congratulations to you and your family Gerritt and best wishes going forward.
Congratulations to you and your Family Gerritt, and great for you my friend
Thanks everyone  other then lack of sleep everyone here is doing well. I forgot just how much work is involved with a newborn....  So worth it though.  Tight lines and happy thoughts,  G
Great post.  Very positive and uplifting.  Congrats on your little one too.

After a ton of turmoil and a boatload of bad choices... I have had enough living a life of regrets...  During my downfall I pissed a lot of folks off... Including some of my friends here.  I won't get into details... But some have forgiven me.. Some have not.  For that I am sorry.  But given the fact I was at my bottom there was no where to go but up! I got some help, the professional kind.... And dealt with some the demons that have been haunting me.  Anyways, I remarried last June, to a great woman that was willing to take the time and over look my flaws that were caused by circumstance and the cards dealt to me.  Today I would like to introduce you to Crawford. Our son and little brother to Liam and the late Terrance.  There could not be a man happier on the planet right now as I am. From dangerous thoughts less then three years ago, to therapy, to family, marriage and now this!  I really think someone up there is looking out for me.  I have a lot to be thankful for.  Welcome, Crawford Philip Arno Aalbers to the OFC Family...      Mom and baby are doing just fine.  G.
He's a keeper. Cherish every living breathing moment. In the wink of an eye he will be all grown up and you will wonder where the time went.
Congrats to the Aalbers family

Congrats!  I am looking forward to the arrival of my own little fishing buddy, my first grandson Sheldon is supposed to be arriving on or about July 25th and I already have a rod combo picked out for him!
That's great. Enjoy all the moments ahead
I see him with a spiderman or superman fishing rod in the near future!! Congratulations!!! Life is too short to live with regrets. Move forward and enjoy it.
Great to hear things are going good for ya G! Congrats on the new addition!!! Thats awesome! I still have an open seat for ya if you can find time for some eyes!  S.
Congrats Gerritt !!!! Same as shayne said open seat in my Lund anytime !!!! Cheers "fish-on"
Wonderful news Gerritt & congratulations to your entire family.
Congratulations!! All the very best for your family.
Congrats Gerritt - in many ways.  All up hill from here.
I tend not to worry what others think anymore G.  Grats to you and all..  Keep at it. It,s a steep hill.
Congratulations!
Congrats also....I'm Positive you will form a bond with the outdoors and your family----and it will be the best of times
Congratulations!  He is a cutie
Good for Gerritt and congrats on the new addition!!!
That's great. Enjoy all the moments ahead x2
congrats on the new addition , another fishing partner is born
Congrats to you, Gerritt. I'm glad things are shaping up for you.
Congrats! And all the best
Congrats to you both Gerritt! I bet the grand parents are tickled pink!  Definitely a cutie! Get's that from his Mom! HH
Congrats.
Gerritt...Wonderful news...Congrats !!!
Good job!  He's just a couple weeks from my baby daughter...
Fantastic news Gerritt!!  Congrats!!!  Great to know that everyone is doing well.
